tool_description: Collects real-time and historical market data including prices, volumes, and trends for specified products and time periods.

product_ids.description: List of product identifiers to collect data for

error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Empty product list: product_ids array must contain at least one valid product identifier
Unsupported data source: one or more data_sources are not available or accessible
Data retrieval failure: unable to fetch data from specified sources within timeout period
usage: Specify product_ids and data_sources arrays, set start_date and end_date for the desired time range, optionally enable volume data collection.

date_range.description: Actual date range of collected data

data_points.description: Total number of data points retrieved

collection_status.description: Overall status of the collection process
